code: import React,{useState}from"react";import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[file,setFile]=useState(null);const[docxId,setDocxId]=useState("");const[message,setMessage]=useState("");const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleFileChange=e=>{setFile(e.target.files[0]);};const handleFileUpload=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!file){setMessage("Please select an image to upload.");return;}setLoading(true);const formData=new FormData();formData.append("image",file);try{const response=await fetch("/upload",{method:"POST",body:formData});const result=await response.json();if(result.error){setMessage(result.error);}else{setMessage("Image uploaded successfully!");setDocxId(result.docx_id);}}catch(error){console.error("Error:",error);setMessage("Error uploading image.");}finally{setLoading(false);}};const handleDownload=()=>{window.location.href=`/download/${docxId}`;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Upload Image and Generate Report"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleFileUpload,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",accept:"image/*",onChange:handleFileChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,children:loading?"Uploading...":"Upload Image"})]}),message&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:message}),docxId&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDownload,children:"Download Generated Report"})]});}export default App;
